lead_paragraph: SITNICK--Linda. The Board, students, faculty, and staff of Kaufman Music Center/Lucy Moses School extend our condolences to Trustee Irving Sitnick on the passing of his devoted wife Linda. She was a force of humor, goodness, and courage --qualities that shone whenever we saw her. She will be sorely missed. Our hearts go out to Irving, their children Samuel (Alix) and Elizabeth (David), and their grandchildren. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Rosalind Devon, Chairman Cathy White O'Rourke, President Lydia Kontos, Executive Director 1/3
